stripped_text: Dividends 1 (When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) You may install that card, ignoring all costs. If you do not, add it to HQ.

title: Off the Books
